feature.label: Prime OntoUML SDK
feature.description:
OntoUML Prime SDK provides a simplified metamodel intended to serve as reference metamodel for OntoUML applications.
Unlike RefOntoUML which was created on top of Eclipse UML2 Ecore metamodel, this metamodel was created from scratch and maps directly to OntoUML concepts.
